channel.title: CVE Feed for Unisoc (Shanghai) Technologies Co., Ltd. -- T606/T612/T616/T610/T618/T760/T770/T820/S8000

item.title: CVE-2022-47351|2024-10-17T14:42:46.629Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t606%2Ft612%2Ft616%2Ft610%2Ft618%2Ft760%2Ft770%2Ft820%2Fs8000
